name: My Github nexus
tagline: All my Github code in one place
body:
# Personal work
This repository contains work and data I've created for work at the St. Paul Pioneer Press and for personal projects.

Pioneer Press code and data should be considered copyrighted by the Pioneer Press and may not be used without further permission. Data produced on my own time is available under the [Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/), and that personal code is available under the [MIT License](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).

Feel free to [contact me](mailto:dhmontgomery@gmail.com) with any questions or comments.

The Github repository for my Pioneer Press code can be found [here](https://github.com/dhmontgomery/pioneer-press-code); below are my work projects:

Date | Project | Github Folder
---|---------|-------------
April 16, 2016 | 2008 Minnesota Legislature ideology graphs | [Get the code](https://github.com/pioneerpress/code/tree/master/mnleg-ideology-2008)
Nov. 16, 2015 | Syrian ancestry map | [Get the code](https://github.com/pioneerpress/code/tree/master/syrian-map)
Aug. 9, 2015 | [Animated Minnesota population pyramids](http://blogs.twincities.com/politics/2015/08/09/visualized-minnesotas-greying-future/) | [Get the code](https://github.com/pioneerpress/code/tree/master/mn-pop-pyramid-gifs)
April 10, 2015 | [Minnesota State of the State address analysis](http://blogs.twincities.com/politics/2015/04/10/governors-by-their-words/) | [Get the code](https://github.com/pioneerpress/code/tree/master/mn-sots-analysis)

The Github repository for my personal code can be found [here](https://github.com/dhmontgomery/personal-work); below are my personal projects: 

Date | Project | Folder
|---|-----|-----------------|
June 2, 2016 | ["With every word, I drop knowledge: A lexical analysis of 'Hamilton'"](http://dhmontgomery.com/2016/03/with-every-word-i-drop-knowledge-a-lexical-analysis-of-hamilton/) | [Get the code](https://github.com/dhmontgomery/personal-work/tree/master/hamilton-analysis)
May 11, 2016 | MLB pitch visualizations | [Get the code](https://github.com/dhmontgomery/personal-work/tree/master/pitchviz)
July 21, 2015 | [Alphab√©tisation](http://dhmontgomery.com/2015/07/alphabetisation/) | [Get the code](https://github.com/dhmontgomery/personal-work/tree/master/1872-french-literacy)
Aug. 28, 2014 | [Deceptively efficient at attracting tourism](http://dhmontgomery.com/2014/08/deceptively-efficient-at-attracting-tourism/) | [Get the code](https://github.com/dhmontgomery/personal-work/tree/master/tourism-efficiency)
March 31, 2014 | [Primates of the States](http://dhmontgomery.com/2014/03/primates-of-the-states/) | [Get the code](https://github.com/dhmontgomery/personal-work/tree/master/state-city-populations)

Readme template derived from [Fivethirtyeight's data repository](https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
